text.section: Notice of such motion shall be served on the party against whom judgment is sought, at least ten (10) days before the motion is made. The motion and notice thereof shall be served by an officer authorized to serve a summons, and the service and return shall be made in the manner prescribed for service of summons by the Rules of Civil Procedure.
The notice shall state the nature and grounds of the motion, and the day on which it will be made.

law.history: Transferred and amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, secs. 1 and 18, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. secs. 445, 446.
